//testbench 
00000000 00000000
00000001 05031000 //SUb $2,$8,$3 --> $2= 5-2=3
00000002 00430800 //Add $1,$2,$3 --> $1 = 0+2=2
00000003 0901F000 //AND $30, $8,$1 --> $1E = 2&0 = 0
00000004 1502F800 //MUL $31,$8,$2 --> $1F = 5*3 = F (15)
00000005 03fa5000 //ADD $10, $31,$26 --> $A = $1F & $ 1A = 0 + 0 = 0
00000006 18E40001 //ADDI $4,$7,1 --> $4 = 0 + 1 = 1
00000007 00000000  //NOP
00000008 00000000
